search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Chatbase (chatbase.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Chatbase is: [https://www.chatbase.com/pricing](https://www.chatbase.com/pricing) .

extracted_content.content:
Predictable pricingscalable plans
---------------------------------

Designed for every stage of your journey.

### ![Image 1: Free plan icon](https://www.chatbase.com/_next/static/media/star-1.789b840b.svg)Free

$0

per month

*   Access to fast models*   100 message credits/month
*   400 KB per AI agent
*   1 team member
*   1 AI agent
*   Limit of 10 links to train on
*   Embed on unlimited websites
AI agents get deleted after 14 days of inactivity on the free plan.

### ![Image 2: Hobby plan icon](https://www.chatbase.com/_next/static/media/star-2.b9628ce6.svg)Hobby

$40

per month

Everything in Free +*   Access to advanced models*   2,000 message credits/month
*   1 AI agent
*   5 AI Actions per AI agent
*   33 MB per AI agent
*   Unlimited links to train on
*   API access
*   Integrations*   Basic analytics

### ![Image 3: Standard plan icon](https://www.chatbase.com/_next/static/media/star-3.e8fb0576.svg)Standard

Popular

$150

per month

[](https://www.chatbase.com/dashboard?next=/settings/plans)

Everything in Hobby +*   12,000 message credits/month
*   10 AI Actions per AI agent
*   3 team members
*   2 AI agents

Trusted by 9000+ business worldwide

Add-ons

Fine-tune your plan with powerful add-ons
-----------------------------------------

### Auto recharge credits

When your credits fall below the threshold you set, we'll automatically add credits that don't expire to your account, ensuring uninterrupted service.

$14Total per 1000 message credits

### Extra message credits

$12 per 1000 credits / month

$12Total per month

### Extra agents

$7 per AI agent / month

$7Total per month

### Custom domains

Use your own custom domains for the AI agent's embed script, iframe, and shareable link.

$59Total per month

### Remove 'Powered By Chatbase'

Remove the Chatbase branding from the iframe and widget

$39Total per month

features: Limit of 10 links to train on

additional_fees.fee_description: Use your own custom domains for the AI agent's embed script, iframe, and shareable link.
Remove the Chatbase branding from the iframe and widget.
